title: Gold Steadies as Traders Await Commodity Index Rebalancing, Data
description: Gold steadied, after slipping nearly 1% in the previous session ahead of US jobs data and an annual rebalancing of broad commodity indexes.
content: Gold steadied, after slipping nearly 1% in the previous session ahead of US jobs data and an annual rebalancing of broad commodity indexes.
